Text: And I won't give up the \n investigation so easily.
He's got strong \n convictions, \n I'll give him that.
Is the lady with that \n man what they call a \n "shill"?

Yes! But where'd 
 you learn that word? 
 Kids, they grow up 
 so fast...
I can't even believe \n we're wasting our time \n talking to him.
But...
I guess it's only fair \n they wouldn't believe me \n without proof.
Well, the Grigo with the \n footage had to make a \n bit of a sacrifice...
Meow!

What happened to the 
 video proof you 
 promised? Was that all 
 made up too?
Honestly, it's more \n like he's just throwing \n trash in the storms...
But he's not really \n doing much \n "investigating"...
But hey, we learned a \n lot, didn't we?
*Sigh*
You've got to believe \n him, he's telling the \n truth.
It's my destiny to \n expose the truth.

Hey, how's the 
 investigation about 
 what's on the other side 
 of the storms going?
The time I've been \n waitin' for has finally \n arrived!
What do you mean?
The truth, of course! \n The truth about what's \n on the other side...
I'm finally going to \n prove it to my fellow \n citizens!

But they weren't buying 
 it even after you showed 
 them that photo 
 evidence.
But this time I've got a \n new plan!

I found an old, 
 discarded Grigo that 
 lost a fight to 
 the Nevi.

I gave it a knock, and 
 it came whirrin' back to 
 life. So I threw it in 
 the storm.
Grigos are all equipped \n with video cameras, \n right?
All I need you to do is \n bring it back from the \n other side.
Ah, I see! It'll have \n video footage of the \n world through the storm.
Exactly! \n Now, let's get ready.
This is the storm I \n tossed the Grigo \n through.
Oh! Don't forget this.
I engineered the radio \n to respond to the \n Grigo's transmitter.
You just have to follow \n the signal, and you'll \n find the Grigo.

If only he'd use all 
 this passion and 
 energy for something 
 more constructive...
I'm lowerin' down \n the cage!
Did you make it?
This is...
What is it? You \n recognize the place \n again?

Yeah, this is the mining 
 site on the other side 
 of the storm near Banga 
 Settlement.
*Ping* *Ping*
Hey, there's a sound \n coming from the radio...
That's the radio \n respondin' to the \n Grigo's transmitter.

The signal should grow 
 stronger the closer you 
 get, so follow the 
 signal to the Grigo.
Got it!
Did you find the Grigo?
No... I found \n a park bench.
Have you been throwing \n other stuff in here?
Oh yeah, I threw that \n in for you in case you \n needed a break.
That was nice of you, \n but the radio is \n responding to it.
Oh... Oops.

I forgot I put 
 transmitters on 
 everythin' I threw 
 down there.
How am I supposed to \n pinpoint the Grigo then?
Just keep tracking \n down the transmitter \n signals...
You'll eventually \n find that Grigo.
Please don't throw \n anything else in here \n for me...
Did you find the Grigo?
No... I found a bunch of \n Nevi hovering around an \n antenna.
Have you been throwing \n other stuff in here?
Oh, yeah, I tossed that \n in for kicks.
Alright, but the radio \n is responding to the \n antenna.
Oh... Oops.

I forgot I put 
 transmitters on 
 everythin' I threw 
 down there.
How am I supposed to \n pinpoint the Grigo then?
Just keep tracking \n down the transmitter \n signals...
You'll eventually \n find that Grigo.
Please don't throw \n anything else in here \n for me...
Did you find the Grigo?
No... There are Nevi \n gathered around a flower \n planter.
Have you been throwing \n other stuff in here?
Oh yeah, I tossed that \n in for kicks.
Alright, but the radio \n is responding to the \n planter.
Oh... Oops.

I forgot I put 
 transmitters on 
 everythin' I threw 
 down there.
How am I supposed to \n pinpoint the Grigo then?
Just keep tracking \n down the transmitter \n signals...
You'll eventually \n find that Grigo.
Please don't throw \n anything else in here \n for me...
Did you find the Grigo?
No... But there are a \n bunch of crates lying \n around.
Have you been throwing \n other stuff in here?
Oh yeah, I tossed that \n in for kicks.
Alright, but the radio \n is responding to the \n crates.
Oh... Oops.

I forgot I put 
 transmitters on 
 everythin' I threw 
 down there.
How am I supposed to \n pinpoint the Grigo then?
Just keep tracking \n down the transmitter \n signals...
You'll eventually \n find that Grigo.
Please don't throw \n anything else in here \n for me...
What's that!?
What'd you find?
A weird gravity storm, \n the radio's responding \n to it!
I'll try to go in for a \n closer look.
The radio's definitely \n responding to something \n inside.
That Grigo must've \n wandered into it.
I'm not leaving \n empty-handed...
I'll check the \n other side!
Just be careful, \n alright?
Call me if you \n have any trouble.
I'll make sure the cage \n is ready to pull you up.
Thanks!
The storm vanished...
It's... okay I read... \n your position...
You're breaking \n up on me.
Must be... \n gravity waves...
Anything... strange?
It does feel a little \n different from the usual \n mining sites...
There's gravity ore \n everywhere.
Gather... ore \n for samples...
Okay, I'll grab some to \n take back with me!
Wow, this stuff is \n really high quality.
I'd never seen anything \n like it when I was with \n the Banga Settlement.
You... unexplored \n land... pure ore...
Grigo there... \n hear a response...
Hmm, I don't see it \n around here.
I'll try to track it \n down with the radio.
Okay... Be careful...
I found the Grigo, but \n it's surrounded by Nevi!
If I fight them up \n close, I might hurt \n the Grigo.
You have... save the \n Grigo...
I'll do what I can...
I did it! \n The Grigo's safe!
Good job... \n Home... \n Evidence...
I don't think this \n Grigo's working...
Just... A kick... \n Worked... \n Before...
A kick? I can do that, \n no problem!
Meow...
Huh!?
That gravity storm came \n out of nowhere...
Where did it \n bring me?
Hey, can you hear me?
My radio's gone!
Dusty... I think \n we're in trouble.
Meow...
Great... What now?
Huh? \n Did you \n hear that?
Hazard detected. \n Eradication protocol \n initialized.
Just stay quiet, you'll \n wake the Nevi.
Attention citizens, seek \n shelter immediately.
Thanks a lot!
Now I've got to fight \n that huge Nevi. \n Come on, Dusty.
Meow!
*Phew* Managed \n to take it down.
But I'm still stuck \n here...
Hey, Grigo, got any \n ideas?
Citizen distress \n registered... Distress \n call sent.
Huh?
Can you hear me?
You're alive!
Yeah, \n I managed somehow.
The gravity waves have \n dissipated, I can hear \n you loud and clear.

After we lost 
 communication, 
 I heard the 
 distress call.

So I lowered the cage 
 as soon as I could. 
 Seems like it arrived 
 right on time.
Well, "right on time" \n might be an \n overstatement.
It crushed and \n blew up the Grigo.
Wh-What!?
We were so close to \n finally fulfilling your \n dream. I'm sorry...
It's okay... I'm just \n glad you're safe.
Hop into the cage, \n I'll bring you up.
The Nevi keep coming, I need to take out the antenna!
Doesn't look like anything is this way.
Find the Grigo
Enter the Gravity Storm
I've already looked around here.
The Nevi are gathering around that antenna...
Explorer: \n Somethin' about it must've caught their interest.
I better destroy it.
I've already looked around here.
There are a lot of those tree-like Nevi around...
Explorer: \n Tree-like? Hmm, I did throw a planter down there.
The signal's coming from inside the Nevi!
There are a lot of crates down there.
Explorer: \n I tossed a big container in, maybe the crates came loose?
Guess I have to break them.
Signal Strength
Hm?
I'm getting close!
I've got a signal!
That way!
I should try that way.
Better break that antenna.
I should take out the Nevi.
I need to break the boxes.
Explorer: \n If you break them, the signal should cut out.
Now to take out the Nevi.
Better keep looking for a signal.
Is that a park bench?
Explorer: \n I snagged it from an old, abandoned park.
Explorer: \n I tossed it in thinking you might need a break.
A break does sound nice... But I've got work to do.
Time to continue looking for signal sources.
It's close!
The source is close now.
Doesn't look like there's anything this way.
There's a big container here.
Explorer: \n What's... inside...?
Aah! What's this!?
I've already looked around here.
Mine for Ore
I need to mine some ore.
Find the Grigo
That's-
Grigo: \n Danger. Please evacuate the area.
Can I take 'em out without setting them off?
Defeat the Nevi and \n Save the Grigo
I have to save that Grigo!
The Grigo should be safe now.
Oh no, the Grigo!
Maybe if I can hit 'em from a distance.
I can throw some of that stuff...
I can toss this at the Nevi!
If I get a little weight behind me, I can break it apart.
I'm getting close!
I got a reaction!
It's right over there.
That way!
It's right around here!
I should try that way.
W-Wait!
Grigo: \n Citizen, please evacuate.
Grigo: \n Gravity storm detected. Please evacuate.
Grigo: \n Danger. Please evacuate the area.
Is it broken?
Grigo: \n Danger. Danger.
AAAH!
Huh?
There are people surrounded by Nevi!
Storm Explorer: \n I don't remember throwing any people down there.
I've got to help them!
Ah, they're just mannequins.
Okay, better keep looking for a signal.
Fix the Grigo
Doesn't look like anything is this way.
That's like that thing I saw in the Forbidden Land...
What's the Grigo doing!?
Grigo: \n Citizen, please evacuate.
Grigo: \n Gravity storm detected. Please evacuate.
Grigo: \n Danger. Please evacuate the area.
Defeat the Giant Nevi
Grigo: \n Sending distress signal. Help is on the way.
Get in the Cage
I hope he gets the distress signal...
That's...
Grigo: \n Danger. Please evacuate the area.
The Grigo!
There's a radio in the cage!
